document.full_text: the absence of a triple crown contender has provided an unexpected extra edge to saturday's $1 million belmont stakes, triggering a rare outbreak of trash-talking in the normally conservative world of thoroughbred racing.
document.title: trash talking dominates build-up to belmont stakes
lines_and_colors: the absence of a triple crown contender has provided an unexpected extra edge to saturday's $1 million belmont stakes, triggering a rare outbreak of trash-talking in the normally conservative world of thoroughbred racing.
